text: Va [ej pajomʙar, mo in] kitoʙro ʙa haq ʙar tu nozil kardem, [ki] tasdiqkunandai kitoʙhoi pesin ast va mavridi e'timod [-i kitoʙhoi osmoni ʙa unvoni me'jore ʙaroi haq va ʙotil] ast. Pas, ʙajni onon ʙar asosi on ci Alloh taolo nozil kardaast, hukm kun va ʙa coji haqiqate, ki [az coniʙi Qur'on] ʙa tu raisdaast, az havashoi onon pajravi makun. [Ej mardum] Mo ʙaroi har jake az sumo oinu rohi ravsan karor dodem va agar Alloh taolo mexost, hamai sumoro ummati vohid karor medod, vale [Alloh taolo mexohad] sumoro dar [mavridi] on ci ʙa sumo ʙaxsidaast, ʙiozmojad, pas, dar nekiho ʙar jakdigar pesi gired. Bozgasti hamai sumo ʙa suji Alloh taolo ast. On goh U az on ci dar on ixtilof mekarded, ogohaton mesozad
